original_text: Then Peter went down to the men which were sent unto him from Cornelius; and said, Behold, I am he whom ye seek: what is the cause wherefore ye are come?
korean_text: 베드로가 내려가 그 사람들을 보고 이르되 내가 곧 너희가 찾는 사람인데 너희가 무슨 일로 왔느냐

sentences.original_text: Then Peter went down to men
which were sent unto him from Cornelius
and said, Behold, I am he
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 말하되, 보라, 내가 그 사람이라
